title: How can we index the articles faster for the SEO run? - Quora

response.answer_text: Indexing activity in SEO plays a crucial role in SEO through which you can easily index your articles/blogs in a short period of time. There are various ways though which you can index your articles or blogs. Some of the popular ways of same are as follows: Search consoleSocial bookmarkingSocial bookmarking and profile creation on high DA websitesSome article gets indexed automatically due to the setting present on the website which you need to enable at the time of designing and developing a website.So according to me the above stated points you can follow to index your article or blogs of your website.

Articles on your website can be index faster through these steps- Get the sitemap work done on your websiteMake sure robots.txt is not blocking crawlers.Try fetch and render in the webmaster account of your siteWrite something new, innovative and comprehensive which will attract user attentionVarious off-page and on-page factor can also come into the picture
add submit RSS and sitemap with different links.
